long_description: The Electra Ticino 8D has a relaxed, upright ride and a smart, convenient build for jaunting about town in comfort. Aluminum frame and classic lugged steel fork stand up to the rigors of everyday use. Shimano Rapidfire Plus trigger shifter and Shimano Sora rear derailleur provide snappy shifts; 8 gears offer easy pedaling without many complicated parts. Convenient platform pedals do not require special shoes-just hop on and go! Rounding out the classic look are matching saddle, handlebar grips and gorgeous hammered alloy fenders. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: The Electra Ticino 8D has a relaxed, upright ride and a smart, convenient build for jaunting about town in comfort.
